metadata.title: CVE-2020-36777 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: media:dvbdev: Fix memory leak in dvb_media_device_free() dvb_media_device_free()is leaking memory. Free `dvbdev->adapter->conn` before setting it to NULL,as documented in include/media/media-device.h: "The media_entity instanceitself must be freed explicitly by the driver if required."

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
